> Warhead: Yes, Megatron. We could mount a raid against the maximals, if
> they have arrived. No doubt they will concentrate on repairing and
> building their defences before they come at us. Ultrabyte and I will
> likely be a good assault force.
>

{Nightshade}

    The fem bot sighed kicking a piece of metal so it bounced across the
metallic floor, "Assault this, assault that, we don't even know how many
maximals there are let alone the state of their ship." Chuckling she walked
towards the gathered preds and leaned on his shoulder and spoke in her
original accented drawl, "But don't let little 'ol me stop you, da'ling.
I'ma sure we can find a big enough piece o scrap to scrape yers off the face
of the planet..."

    Chuckling she swung away the flight of fancy having grown boring...
